entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Monday 20 March 2023
